code: import{useState}from"react";import julioSomo from'../assets/images/image-juliusomo.png';import moment from'moment';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReplyForm=_ref=>{let{addReply}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState('');const[userName,setUserName]=useState('juliosomo');const[profile_picture,setProfilePic]=useState(julioSomo);const[initial,setInitial]=useState('@maxblagun ');const handleReply=event=>{event.preventDefault();setUserName('juliosomo');setProfilePic(julioSomo);setInitial('@maxblagun ');const timeStamp=moment().format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss');addReply({text,timeStamp,userName,profile_picture,initial});document.getElementById('replyForm').style.display='none';setText('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"replyForm",id:"replyForm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleReply,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"",src:"",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{maxLength:150,value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add a reply...."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"REPLY"})]})});};export{ReplyForm};
